name: Spit kid
description:
Sit on a rooftop, block the door and start spitting down to earth onto people. If police gets called don't worry you've got a bunch of bricks to your right ;)

Rules:
Make combos to multiply your score by spitting onto people with same clothes.
If someone makes it to the other side of building without getting spitted on, you'll lose 50 points, except for ones with brown suits.
If someone runs for the phone, spit on them once more before they finish the call to police and they'll run away.
If police climbs building, throw brick to stop them temporarily.
Everyone has chance of calling the police so be on guard to prevent them from calling too many police because you've got a limited amount of bricks which kind of represent your health bar.
People with brown suite will always call the police but they earn you twice the points.

Controls:
Make noise to spit (simply blowing into the mic works too).
Motion Controller trigger to pick up and throw bricks.
Motion Controller shoulder button to calibrate your position. (calibrate at launch)

Just get as many points as possible before you are caught. Have fun spitting!
